Set on an island off the coast of New England in the 1960s, as a young boy and girl fall in love they are moved to run away together. 
Various factions of the town mobilize to search for them and the town is turned upside down -- which might not be such a bad thing.

Note: 
MK was shot on 16mm, which means it has a terribly grainy and drab look.
Blu-ray transfer contains dusty veneer of grain (thousands of tiny pixels flickering) not so bad though in motion pictures as in snap shots.
Faces at least look "uglier" on source in my opinion. I didn't denoise, just beblocked 0:0 (instead of the usual -3:-3).
